blog.content:
### Create a complete website in the time it usually takes to build a prototype

#### Build sites with the services you want, like Shopify, Stripe, and WordPress, quickly and easily with Gatsby’s 2000+ plugins. 
####Integrate data from anywhere: APIs, databases, CMSs, static files — or multiple sources at once.

- Served from CDN
- Instant load
- Search engine indexable
- Image placeholders

![website-rebuilt-in-gatsbyjs](http://localhost:1337/uploads/website-rebuilt-in-gatsbyjs_26289c1c98.png)
